title: Negative Self Talk While Losing Weight (Fat Girl Thinking)
itunes:title: Negative Self Talk While Losing Weight (Fat Girl Thinking)
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Today we talk about a topic I’ve been blogging about for years: Fat Girl Thinking or FGT. That’s the inner tantrum, that chick inside your head that moans about everything you’re trying to change or improve.

It’s also that voice that tells you how bad you look, how terrible you feel, and why you should stop trying to lose weight.

This podcast will show you how to start practicing thoughts that counter balance your FGT. You’ll stop the chatter and learn to create new thoughts to shut down your inner bully.
